summary: Removes most tints of player camera due to absorb health/stamina/magicka.
descriptionHtml:
I got tired of the absorb echantments giving the horrid tint every time, and since I really like the enchantments themselves I decided to remove the visual effect by editing the imagspacemodifiers of the enchantments and spell that use these effects. 

Only the regular absorb spells and enchants should be affected, the impact on target and funnel  visuals remain so you still can see that the effects are in use.

If there are any bugs etc don\'t hesitate to inform me in comments section.

Install either by NMM OR by extracting zip to data folder and clicking it in data files in Skyrim launcher
------
Changelog:
v2 optional
Added removal of the funnel effect on enchants only.
v2
All absorb spells and enchantments now don\'t show tint
v1
Only the base enchants were affected, but the method of removal caused constant blur effect in certain areas.
author: firas55556

files.name: Absorb effect removal - no funnel on enchants
files.fileName: Absorb effect removal - no funnel on enchants-9670.zip
